actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Science Research and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Science, Research and Technology

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal years 1983 and 1984, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Bureau of Standards Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1983 and 1984

summary.text: National Bureau of Standards Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1983 and 1984 - Authorizes appropriations for the activities of the National Bureau of Standards for FY 1983 and 1984, including: (1) measurement research and standards; (2) engineering measurements and standards; (3) central technical support; (4) the National Technical Information Service; and (5) salary adjustments.

titles.title: National Bureau of Standards Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1983 and 1984
A bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal years 1983 and 1984, and for other purposes.
